devdoc.author: Accelerate Finance
devdoc.details: This contract is responsible for creating new instances of the Escrow contract.

constructor.details: Inherits from the Auth contract to implement access control.

params.deployer: The address of the entity deploying the contract, serving as the initial administrator.

newEscrow(address).details: Only authorized users can call this function.

params.deployer: The address of the deployer for the new Escrow contract.

returns._0: address  The address of the newly created Escrow contract.

devdoc.title: EscrowFactory

EscrowDeployed(address).notice: Event emitted when Escrow is deployed.

constructor.notice: Constructor function that initializes the contract and sets the deployer as the authorized user.

deny(address).notice: Remove user as a ward (remove admin access)

newEscrow(address).notice: Creates a new instance of the Escrow contract.

rely(address).notice: Make user a ward (give them admin access)

wards(address).notice: Returns whether the target is a ward (has admin access)

userdoc.notice: Allows authorized users to deploy new Escrow contracts.
